title: Anagram Check
statement:
# Anagram Check

Determine if two strings are anagrams of each other.

## Problem Description

Two strings are anagrams if they contain the same characters with the same frequencies, ignoring case.

## Input Format

Two lines, each containing a string (letters only, no spaces).

## Output Format

Print `YES` if anagrams, `NO` otherwise.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ length ≤ 1000
- Only alphabetic characters
